name: FIN_ASST_TRKR_RTE_EVT_HX
description: This table contains a history of RTE integration for a tracker.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the program tracker record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EVT_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant an event was logged in UTC

columns.name: EVT_TYP_C_NAME
entries: Program filter rules restricted all payers & plans
Query failed due to tracker or patient data. User note logged.

columns.name: EVT_PLAN_ID_BEN_PACKAGE_NAME
columns.description: *** Deprecated *** In table CLARITY_EPP_OT, the column BEN_PACKAGE_NAME (CMK .2) has been deprecated.  This column already exists as BENEFIT_PACKAGE_NM (CMK .2) in table CL_CMK. To look up the deprecated column's value after the Clarity Compass upgrade, join column CLARITY_EPP_OT.BEN_PACKAGE_ID to table CL_CMK column BENEFIT_PACKAGE_ID and get the BENEFIT_PACKAGE_NM value.   The name of the benefit package for this benefit plan.The ID of the benefit package is in the column BEN_PACKAGE_ID.

columns.name: EVT_RULE_ID
columns.description: Program rule that matched when the tracker query was attempted

columns.name: EVT_ADDL_INFO
columns.description: Additional info regarding RTE error codes
